template.name: aj_ngdcf
template.description: A compile function

template.name: aj_ngdlf
template.description: A linking function in a directive.

template.name: aj_ngdc
template.description: A directive with a compile function

template.name: aj_ngdl
template.description: A directive with a linking function only.

template.name: aj_ngc
template.description: Define a new Angular Controller. You can change the controller name and parameters.

template.name: aj_ngfor
template.description: angular.foreach loop

template.name: aj_ngindex
template.description: Simple way of bootstraping angular app for prototyping purposes

template.name: aj_ngsa
template.description: Script tag importing base AngularJS file from CDN

template.name: aj_ngst
template.description: A script tag holding Angular's template

template.name: aj_ngb
template.description: A binding in AngularJS

template.name: aj_ngm
template.description: A new angular module without a config function.

template.name: aj_ngma
template.description: A new angular module without a config function and a variable assigment.

template.name: aj_ngmc
template.description: A new angular module with a config function

template.name: aj_ngmfa
template.description: A factory in a module

template.name: aj_ngms
template.description: Define an Angular Module Service to be attached to a previously defined module. You can change the service name and service injectables.

template.name: aj_ngmfi
template.description: Define an Angular Module Filter to be attached to a previously defined module. You can change the filter name.

template.name: aj_ngrw
template.description: Defines a when condition of an AngularJS route.

template.name: aj_ngrwr
template.description: Defines a when condition of an AngularJS route with the resolve block.

template.name: aj_ngro
template.description: Defines an otherwise condition of an AngularJS route.

template.name: aj_$f
template.description: Define a new $scope'd function (usually inside an AngularJS Controller). You can change the function name and arguments.

template.name: aj_$v
template.description: Defines a new $scope'd variable inside an AngularJS controller.

template.name: aj_$va
template.description: Defines a new $scope'd variable inside an AngularJS controller and assigns a value from a contstructor arguments.

template.name: aj_$w
template.description: Define a $watch for an expression. You can change the expression to be watched.

template.name: aj_$on
template.description: Define a $on for a $broadcast/$emit on the $scope inside an Angular Controller. You can change the event name to listen on.

template.name: aj_$b
template.description: Define a $broadcast for a $scope inside an Angular Controller / Angular Controller Function. You can change the event name and optional event arguments.

template.name: aj_$e
template.description: Define an $emit for a $scope inside an Angular Controller / Angular Controller Function. You can change the event name and optional event arguments.
